result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Miguel Angel Bolanos in court.  Attorney Jason Mitchel Daane in court for Miguel Angel Bolanos.  Attorney Samuel Berg in court for State of Wisconsin.

Next hearing 9-19-2022 at 3:00 pm.

Defendant Miguel Angel Bolanos not in court.  Attorney Jason Mitchel Daane in court for Miguel Angel Bolanos.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin. Warrant to issue, bond forfeited. Minutes filed.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Original Warrant filed with the court.

BOND TO COVER 22GF868, 22CM291 & 22CT118

DEFENDANT MUST POST $1000 CASH
Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant will not possess any firearms, ammunition or other weapons. Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH A.D.H. dob 7-12-2002 or RESIDENCE. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Defendant Miguel A Bolanos in court, in custody by video. Zeke Wiedenfeld appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jason Dane for bond purposes only. Total bond with cash component set. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
